text: Péter Gulácsi (born 6 May 1990 in Budapest) is a Hungarian football player. He plays for FC Red Bull Salzburg in the Austrian Bundesliga. He is a goalkeeper. ==Honours== * 1 × Champion Premier Reserve League (with FC Liverpool Reserves): 2007/08 * Third place in the U-20-World Championship 2009 in Egypt ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Hungarian association football goalkeepers Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players Category:RB Leipzig players Category:Hungary at UEFA Euro 2016 Category:Hungary at UEFA Euro 2020 Category:Austrian football champions
title: Péter Gulácsi
